message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with 3D action recognition using pointclouds, which is a topic related to computer vision (cs.CV) and robotics (cs.RO). The proposed Histogram of Oriented Principal Components (HOPC) descriptor is designed to be robust to variations in viewpoint, scale, and action speed, which suggests that machine learning (cs.LG) techniques may have been used to develop and evaluate the descriptor. The paper also mentions the use of Spatio-Temporal Keypoints (STK) and a global descriptor called STK-D, which are likely related to multimedia (cs.MM) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories.
